viennacl::transposed_matrix_proxy

transposed_matrix_proxy< SCALARTYPE, F, A > Class Template Reference

A proxy class for a transposed matrix. Allows several operations without rearranging the underlying values in the GPU memory. More...

 The number of rows of the transposed matrix. Equals the number of columns in the original matrix.

Detailed Description

template<typename SCALARTYPE, typename F, unsigned int A>
class viennacl::transposed_matrix_proxy< SCALARTYPE, F, A >

A proxy class for a transposed matrix. Allows several operations without rearranging the underlying values in the GPU memory.

The number of rows of the transposed matrix. Equals the number of columns in the original matrix.

The number of columns of the transposed matrix. Equals the number of rows in the original matrix.
